name: property_exists
purpose: Checks if the object or class has a property

return.description:
Returns TRUE if the property exists, FALSE if it doesn't exist or
   NULL in case of an error.

notes.description:
Using this function will use any registered 
autoloaders if the class is not already known.

The property_exists function cannot detect properties
    that are magically accessible using the __get
    magic method.

changelog.change:
This function checks the existence of a property independent of 
        accessibility.
